item.title: Rumours that Government is about to raise Dorscon alert level to red are false: S. Iswaran
item.description: SINGAPORE - Rumours that the Government will raise the Disease Outbreak Response System Condition (Dorscon) alert to Red, the highest level, are false. “We are aware there has been false information purveyed on various platforms that we are going to declare Dorscon red, that the Government is going to go into a lockdown mode, that we are going to scale back the MRT and bus services,” Communications and Information Minister S.

item.title: Horas claves en Argentina: ¿se extiende la cuarentena por coronavirus?
item.description: La medida podría anunciarse este viernes. El presidente Alberto Fernández analiza en estas horas la posibilidad de extender la cuarentena obligatoria, ante la suba de contagios registrados en los últimos días.

item.title: Mucize Doktor 29. yeni bölüm fragmanı yayınlandı mı? Mucize Doktor 28. son bölümde neler oldu?
item.description: Mucize Doktor yeni bölüm fragmanı izleyiciler tarafından merak ediliyor. Başrollerini Onur Tuna, Taner Ölmez ve Sinem Ünsal’ın paylaştığı Mucize Doktor 28. bölümüyle izleyicileri ekran başına kilitledi. Dizinin 28. bölümünde Damla ve Nazlı, ilk kez bir hastanın sorumluluğunu birlikte üstlenir ve direkt birbirlerine girerler.

item.title: إحصائيات كورونا في العالم 2020/3/26

item.title: Coronavirus: UK deaths rise by more than 100 in a day
item.description: Image copyright Getty Images The number of coronavirus deaths in the UK has jumped by more than 100 in a day for the first time. The death toll has risen from 475 to 578, health officials have confirmed, with 11,658 confirmed cases.

item.title: Bacaan Niat Puasa Bulan Sya'ban
item.description: Jakarta, CNN Indonesia – Tahun Hijriah memasuki bulan Sya’ban. Pada bulan ini, Nabi Muhammad SAW melakukan puasa sunah, lebih banyak dibandingkan dari bulan lainnya. Berikut niat puasa bulan Sya’ban.Sya’ban merupakan bulan sebelum Ramadan atau bulan ke-8 dalam kalender Hijriah.

item.title: [LOCKDOWN RULES] Definition of 'essential services' during lockdown
item.description: The following services are considered by the government as “essential” during the 21-day lockdown which commences at 00:00 on Friday. Also, read: South Africa is closing shop, but the following essential services will continue throughout:

item.title: Durante la cuarentena sí se puede ir en carro al supermercado, así tenga pico y placa
item.description: Durante estos días de cuarentena, una de las grandes dudas que han tenido las personas en Santa Marta es qué pasaría si el día en que pueden ir a abastecerse a un supermercado, de acuerdo a la terminación de la cédula, también tienen pico y placa.

item.title: Coronavirus: Netflix's series My Secret Terrius 'predicted' pandemic
item.description: It appears to predict the pandemic (Picture: Netflix) Netflix viewers have been left stunned by Korean series My Secret Terrius, which appeared to predict the coronavirus pandemic back in 2018.

item.title: Daniela Santanchè contro Marco Travaglio: 'Vergogna la frase su Bertolaso, la nostra Nazione in lutto fa a meno di certe battute'
item.description: 25 marzo 2020 a a a Le parole di Marco Travaglio su Guido Bertolaso hanno fatto indignare tutti, anche Daniela Santanchè. La senatrice di Fratelli d’Italia ha affidato a Twitter un durissimo sfogo: “Bertolaso positivo al coronavirus e Travaglio scrive che ‘più che creare posti letto ne ha occupato uno’.

item.title: Ingreso solidario en Colombia: qué es y cómo aplicar
item.description: El presidente de la República, Iván Duque Márquez, anunció que 3 millones de familias colombianas se beneficiarán con un proyecto llamado Ingreso Solidario, el cual busca ayudar económicamente a quienes se encuentran en la informalidad y que no hacen parte de ninguno de los proyectos del gobierno como Familias en Acción, Jóvenes en Acción o Adulto Mayor.

item.title: السعودية تمنع الدخول والخروج لـ 3 مدن وتحظر الانتقال فى 13 منطقة
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); اطلاق صافرات الانذار وبدء سريان حظر التجول في كافة مناطق المملكة - فيديو (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); السعودية تغلق 13 منطقة وتحظر التجول في 3 مدن لكبح الوباء وأوضح المتحدث باسم وزارة الداخلية السعودية، المقدم طلال الشلهوب، خلال مؤتمر صحفي، أن مراكز الضبط الأمني ستتولى إنفاذ هذا المنع في كافة الطرق الرئيسية والفرعية، والبرية والزراعية، من وإلى المناطق الثلاثة عشرة.

item.title: ‘This Is Us’ Season 4 Finale: Dan Fogelman On Big Showdown, New Characters & Series’ Final Chapters
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); SPOILER ALERT: This story contains details about the Season 4 finale of This Is Us. When This Is Us creator Dan Fogelman was writing tonight’s Season 4 finale, no one from the show had any idea that it would air during a global pandemic that has claimed the lives of 19,000 people worldwide.

item.title: Prince Charles tests positive for novel coronavirus
item.description: London (CNN) Prince Charles, Queen Elizabeth II’s son and the heir to the British throne, has tested positive for coronavirus and is now self-isolating in Scotland, his office announced Wednesday.

item.title: UK coronavirus death toll jumps to 422 as study says HALF of Brits could already be infected with bug
item.description: THE UK coronavirus death toll hit 422 as a study claimed up to HALF the population may have caught the killer bug. Deaths jumped by 87 in just 24 hours on Tuesday - the biggest daily increase yet - with the youngest victim killed by the virus aged just 33.

item.title: O amor está no ar! Nuno Graciano declara paixão por Fátima Lopes
Morto il principe Filippo? Buckingham Palace tace
item.description: Il principe Filippo, 98 anni, marito della regina Elisabetta, sarebbe morto, almeno per la stampa britannica. Negli ultimi giorni Buckingham Palace ha smentito più volte la notizia. Secondo i tabloid scandalistici inglesi, invece, la sua scomparsa non sarebbe stata annunciata dalla regina Elisabetta per via dell’emergenza da Coronavirus.

item.title: South Africa under lockdown: The rules
item.description: South Africa’s ministers have provided clarity on the lockdown procedures which are being implemented from midnight, Thursday March 26. Prohibition of movement Minister of Police Bheki Cele outlined exactly what is prohibited with regards to movement during the lockdown.

item.title: Cuarta muerte por coronavirus en el país; Colombia llega a 470 casos
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); En Colombia van cuatro muertos y 470 contagiados por coronavirus El Ministerio de Salud anunció este miércoles 92 nuevos casos de coronavirus en Colombia, para un total de 470, y un cuarto fallecido.
